name: The Flower of Marasca
description:
Your wife, Sarah, is dying of a terminal disease. It's too late to save her... but you can at least delay the inevitable.

Deep in the heart of the Temple of Marasca grows a sacred flower, capable of prolonging her lifespan. You must be careful, for the temple hides many hazards... and you must be swift, for Sarah's time grows short...

Features:

  • A sprawling temple filled with enemies and hazards
  • Four collectible powers to help clear the way
  • Multiple endings 

Controls:

  • Left/Right: Move
  • Up: Interact
  • Z: Jump
  • X: Activate power
  • A/S: Change power

Created in 48 hours for Ludum Dare 50.
